movie.name: The Hindenburg
movie.plot: This film is a compendium of the facts and fiction of the events leading up to the disaster. For dramatic effect, Sabotage was chosen as the cause, rather than electricity lashing out at a couple of tons of hydrogen.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.

movie.name: Hindenburg
movie.plot: Hindenburg: Titanic of the Skies dramatizes explosion and crash of the Hindeburg which tragically took the lives of 36 people. It also looks at the investigation into the causes of the disaster which considers the possibility of sabotage and static electricity.
